movies.Title: House of Cards
movies.Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Nathan Darrow
movies.Plot: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.
movies.Awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 12 wins & 87 nominations.

movies.Title: Daredevil
movies.Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Rosario Dawson
movies.Plot: A blind lawyer with his other senses superhumanly enhanced fights crime as a costumed superhero.

movies.Title: Orange Is the New Black
movies.Actors: Taylor Schilling, Michael Harney, Kate Mulgrew, Natasha Lyonne
movies.Plot: The story of Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to fifteen months in prison after being convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting money for her drug-dealing girlfriend.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 30 wins & 49 nominations.

movies.Title: Arrested Development
movies.Actors: Jason Bateman, Portia de Rossi, Will Arnett, Michael Cera
movies.Plot: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.
movies.Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 34 wins & 63 nominations.

movies.Title: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
movies.Actors: Ellie Kemper, Jane Krakowski, Tituss Burgess, Carol Kane
movies.Plot: A woman is rescued from a doomsday cult and starts life over again in New York City.

movies.Title: Marco Polo
movies.Actors: Lorenzo Richelmy, Benedict Wong, Joan Chen, Remy Hii
movies.Plot: In a world replete with greed, betrayal, sexual intrigue and rivalry, "Marco Polo" is based on the famed explorer's adventures in Kublai Khan's court in 13th century China.

movies.Title: Bloodline
movies.Writer: Glenn Kessler, Todd A. Kessler, Daniel Zelman
movies.Actors: Linda Cardellini, Kyle Chandler, Ben Mendelsohn, Enrique Murciano
movies.Plot: A family of adult siblings find that their secrets and scars are revealed when their black sheep of a brother returns home.

movies.Title: BoJack Horseman
movies.Actors: Will Arnett, Amy Sedaris, Alison Brie, Aaron Paul
movies.Plot: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the '90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show "Horsin' Around," but today he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

movies.Title: Hemlock Grove
movies.Actors: Landon Liboiron, Famke Janssen, Bill Skarsgård, Joel de la Fuente
movies.Plot: A teenage girl is brutally murdered, sparking a hunt for her killer. But in a town where everyone hides a secret, will they find the monster among them?
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 nominations.

movies.Title: The Killing
movies.Actors: Mireille Enos, Joel Kinnaman, Billy Campbell, Liam James
movies.Plot: A police investigation, the saga of a grieving family, and a Seattle mayoral campaign all interlock after the body of 17-year-old Rosie Larsen is found in the trunk of a submerged car.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 27 nominations.
